CustomField.formula: IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '+45'), SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '45'), '+' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '+45')), OR( ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'DFJ_DK'), ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'Testamente_DK') ) ), '+45' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '+')), OR( ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'DFJ_DK'), ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'Testamente_DK') ) ), '+' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '+46'), SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '46'), '+' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '+46')), ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'FA_SE') ), '+46' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '+')), ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'FA_SE') ), '+' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), /* --- Ireland block starts --- */ IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '+353'), SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '353'), '+' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '+353')), ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'Ireland') ), '+353' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), '+')), ISPICKVAL(Market_Unit__c, 'Ireland') ), '+' + SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", ""), SUBSTITUTE(Phone, " ", "") ) ) ) ) /* --- Ireland block ends --- */ ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Phone Formatted
